properties.title: Installation of mod_jk2 in the Web Server
properties.author: Jean-Frederic Clere

section.name: Installation
section.p: The actual build mechanism creates the dso files in the build/jk2/${servername} subdirectory of the jakarta-tomcat-connectors/jk. When configure --with-jni is used 2 dso files are created. These files have to be copied in the right location of the web server installation.
